title: I want to see 4 Prestige skins per year AT THE VERY MOST.
body:
Annual, Biannual or Quarterly.

Fuck off with releasing a Prestige Skin every patch.

I own every skin in the game - it costs 750 RP (3 skin shards) to re-roll a skin regardless of whether it's common, Mythic, Prestige or Ultimate skin. At the end of the day I care about how nice a skin looks and how rare/valuable it is.

These skins don't look that great (hint: not every prestige skin needs to be fucking White and Gold) and they're becoming less and less valuable/rare because Riot keeps shitting them out every patch.

replies.body: I actually think the normal version of the skins look better than all the prestige skins honestly. And they've definitely made them way too common
tbh I agree. The Gold/White of the Prestige Skins and Gold Chromas just water the skins down and make them look bland. And they're worth fuck all since Riot shits them out every other patch.

It's not worth no-life-ing for what's basically golden chromas. While prestige Kai'sa was noticably different, the current ones are a joke. Hell, looking back on it? I'm not even sure if I'd consider the time I spent worth it.
Doesn't owning every skin in the game just prove that you'll buy (or grind for) literally anything Riot churns out? Seems like that weakens your position.
No. It means the price or rarity of a skin is irrelevant now so I get to objectively judge it.
